Summary: vivid nighttime meeting of entity.woke up metalobeject in arm pulled out put in ziplock next morning object gone but bagged remained with burn hole in it
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Ocean City
There were no other sightings in Ocean City on or around July 29th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsi was in ocean city maryland when i had a vivid experience of talking to a troll like entity or what appeared to be. The next morning i woke up and went to the bathroom to find an omega shaped metallic object in my left arm. i pulled it out and put it in a brand new ziplock baggy then placed away from any hot lamps in my hat with wallet over top of it. the following morning i woke up to find that the bag remained but had a little crescent shaped burn in the conrner of the bag and the object was missing. i still have the bag and have been unable to reproduce the type of cut on the bag. The only people in the house at the time were my parenst and sister and they were all asleep. The only one i showed the object to was my father whom is very much a sceptic. i asked if anyone tampered with it and none had. I would be willing to go under lie detection to validify the contents of my story. i also still have the bag the object was previously in.
